Class NatchPoller

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.BasePoller
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.natch.NatchPoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlarmPoller, BeaconPoller, DevicePoller, LCSPoller, MeterPoller, SamplePoller
public class NatchPoller extends BasePoller implements AlarmPoller, BeaconPoller, LCSPoller, MeterPoller, SamplePoller
NatchPoller is a poller for the Natch protocol.
Author:
Douglas Lau
